More

So what's this all about?

Claremont Music Scene was created with a purpose of elevating the music and arts community in and around Claremont, CA.

By creating a network of like minded people and a set of tools and channels for managing an organic community, the music scene becomes a product of those who are a part of it. Whether you're a performer, educator, venue, or a fan - Claremont Music Scene has something for you. Our events calendar keeps you up-to-date on what's happening around town. Use our social media channels and web presence to promote your gigs, fill your classes and to connect with others.
